panels.description:
The discovery rate of the subnet peers.
Found is rate per second of nodes that were found with discovery. Rejected is rate per second of nodes that were found with discovery but rejected because of limit or subnet

panels.description:
Rate per second of outgoing topic messages for every topic over the last 5 minutes.
Responses are outgoing, for incoming requests.
Successful Requests are outgoing.
Active are outgoing requests.
panels.title: Outgoing Pubsub Messages RPS (5m rate)

panels.description:
Table breakdown for each stream protocol.
Responses are outgoing, for incoming requests.
Successful Requests are outgoing.
Active Requests are outgoing.

panels.description:
Rate per second of requests,  responses and active requests.
Responses are outgoing, for incoming requests.
Successful Requests are outgoing.
Active are outgoing requests.
